title: yElu naarayanane
sahitya:
Elu narayanane, elu laxmi ramana, elu shri giriyodaya, venkateshaElayya belagayithu 

caraNam 1

aralu mallige jaji, parimalada pushpavanu        Suraru thanthithaare, sujanarella        Aravindalochana madhanagoplalakrishna        Koli koogithu, elayya hariye
caraNam 2

Dasarellaru bandhu, dhooli dharshana gondu        Lesaagi thala dhandigeyanu pidithu        Aadhikesava nimma vishnunamava darisi        Nimma mahimeyanu pogaluthiharayya
